PopupMessage.delete_account_auth_error: Ошибка авторизации. Пожалуйста войдите в аккаунт ещё раз
PopupMessage.delete_account_error: There was an error deleting your account. Please report this issue using the link above
PopupMessage.error: There was an error. Please report this issue using the link above

ResetPassword.password_number: Password must include at least one number

SignUp.title: Sign Up
SignUp.email_invalid: Email is not a valid email address
SignUp.password_no_number: Password must include at least one number
SignUp.password_too_short: Password must be 10 or more characters
SignUp.username_invalid_characters: Username can only include letters, numbers and _
SignUp.username_too_short: Username must be at least 3 characters
SignUp.error: There was an error creating your account. Please report this issue using the link above.

Translate.title: Перевести

AddLanguage.title: Добавить язык
AddLanguage.language_description: An <link>ISO 639 language code</link> followed by an <link2>ISO 3166-1 Region code</link2>. If you can't find your language, make something up! It's not important that this is strictly correct.

Translate.language_missing: Нет вашего языка? Нажмите сюда, чтобы добавить.

Error.title: Something went wrong!
Error.description: Looks like we might have gotten some dirt stuck in our circuits! Please report this using the links below and try again later.
Error.report: Report this issue using <form>this form</form>, <github>through our Github page</github>, or <link>join our Discord</link> to report it there.

Ads.behind_text: Рекламы помогают продолжать MCCreations создавать крутые штуки! Пожалуйста рассмотрите возможность выключения блокировщика рекламы для этого сайта :)

Splashes.5: Minecraft довольно крутой, не так ли?
Splashes.10: Did you know that this is random?

Footer.mojang_disclamer: НЕ ЯВЛЯЕТСЯ ОФИЦИАЛЬНЫМ ПРОДУКТОМ MINECRAFT. НЕ ОДОБРЕН ИЛИ СВЯЗАН С MOJANG.

CreatorSelector.title: Создатели
CreatorSelector.confirm_remove: Нажмите ещё раз, чтобы удалить этого создателя
CreatorSelector.username_description: The name to display on MCCreations.
CreatorSelector.handle_description: If the creator has an account on MCCreations, enter their handle here to have their profile linked.

Images.drop_zone: Drag and Drop an image here, or click to select one.
Images.invalid: Failed to upload because the file is not a valid image.
Images.too_large: Failed to upload because the file is too large.
Images.unknown_error: Failed to upload because of an unknown error.

Files.drop_zone: Drag and Drop a file here, or click to select one.
Files.invalid_file: Failed to upload because the file is not a valid zip archive.

CreateForm.title: Создать
CreateForm.missing_title: A title must be included to save content
CreateForm.missing_short_description: A short description must be included to save content
CreateForm.missing_type: A type must be selected to save content

ImportForm.title: Import
ImportForm.description: Import your existing content from Planet Minecraft, MinecraftMaps.com or Modrinth below.
ImportForm.missing_link: Ссылка должна быть добавлена для добавления контента

Navigation.beta_warning: MCCreations is currently in beta. Please leave any feedback or report any issues using <form>this form</form>, <github>through our Github page</github>, or <link>join our Discord</link> to report it there.

SearchAndFilter.search_placeholder: Ищите название, создателя, версию и так далее.

Version.Bedrock_description: Является ли это файлом для Bedrock Edition

ExtraFiles.required_description: Causes this file to be automatically downloaded with the main file

Version.add_file_description: Add any extra files required for this creation, like resourcepacks

Content.affiliate: Получите сервер для этого {type} со скидкой 25%
Content.logo_alt: The logo for {title}, a Minecraft {type} for Minecraft {minecraft_version} by {creator} on MCCreations

no_tags.title: No Genre Tag
no_tags.description: Content must have at least one a tag

no_creators.title: Нет создателей
no_creators.description: Контент обязан иметь как минимум одного создателя

no_files.title: Нет файлов
no_files.description: Контент обязан иметь как минимум один файл

no_images.title: Нет изображений
no_images.description: Контент обязан иметь как минимум одно изображение.

short_description_too_short.title: Описание слишком которкое
short_description_too_short.description: Ваше описание должно содержать как минимум 40 символов

description_too_short.title: Description Too Short
description_too_short.description: Your description needs to be at least 100 characters

external_images.title: Images From External Sources
external_images.description: You have images that are from external sources. This means that MCCreations cannot guarantee they will continue to work in the future, or will be accessible by all users. We highly recommend you upload these images instead.

few_images.title: Слишком мало изображений
few_images.description: More images help people get a better idea of what your content is about. It is recommended you upload at least 4 including your logo.

not_linked.title: Not Linked to an Account
not_linked.description: This content is not linked to an account on MCCreations. This means that your access to edit this content will expire in 24 hours. It is recommended to upload content with an account so you can retain access to all features.

no_download_link.title: No Download Link
no_download_link.description: At least one download link is required

slug_too_short.title: Slug Too Short
slug_too_short.description: Your slug needs to be at least 2 characters

Edit.title: Название
Edit.title_description: The primary name of your creation. Should be short and sweet!
Edit.slug_description: The unique identifier for your creation. This will be used in the URL, like mccreations.net/maps/your-slug
Edit.short_description_description: A short summary of your creation. This will be used in search results and previews.
Edit.video_url_description: A link to a video of your creation. This will replace your logo on the creation page with an embedded video.
Edit.description_description: A longer description of your creation. This will be used on the main page of your creation.

Tags.genre_description: The primary category of your creation. This gives users a very general idea of how your creation plays.
Tags.subgenre_description: The secondary category of your creation. This gives users a more specific idea of the contents of your creation.

Leaderboards.help: Learn how to setup MCCreations Leaderboards <link>here</link>. Note that leaderboards are only available for Java Edition at this time.
Leaderboards.title: Таблицы лидеров
Leaderboards.message_text_description: Text to display to tell players to submit their score. This is sent in game when your creation ends.
Leaderboards.message_format_description: Extra formatting to add to the tellraw message. Should be formatted like "color":"green", "bold": true

Edit.translation_languages_description: Нет вашего языка? Нажмите сюда, что добавить.

PopupMessage.requested_approval: Content has been requested for approval

Metadata.description_not_found: This {content_type} does not exist on MCCreations
Metadata.title: {title} {content_type} for Minecraft {minecraft_version} by {creator} on MCCreations

Content.datapack_not_found_description: This datapack does not exist or you do not have permission to view it
Content.map_not_found_description: This map does not exist or you do not have permission to view it
Content.resourcepack_not_found_description: This resourcepack does not exist or you do not have permission to view it

Metadata.title: Скачать датапаки | MCCreations
Metadata.description: Download the best Data Packs for Minecraft. Explore the most popular Data Packs and get ready to play! Data Packs are the vanilla equivalent of mods for Minecraft. They can add new features, change the way the game is played, and more!

Leaderboards.submit_time_description: Your time was {hours} hours, {minutes} minutes, {seconds} seconds and {ticks} ticks
